root.name: Tokyo Bus Guide
root.description: Tokyo Bus Guide came out on 12/23/99 and was developed by Fortyfive. Your task is to drive a bus in Tokyo and some other cities in Japan. You have to pick up passengers on your route, inform them of the next stop, make it to the next stop on time (neither too early nor too late), open the doors, etc. Any violation of traffic rules results in a fine. Get fined too often and you have to start all over.
